title: Comparison of the effects of single injection and continuous infusion popliteal nerve block on pain and hemodynamics in diabetic foot surgery; prospective randomized clinical trial
content:
Publication date: 30 July 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 14

Author(s): Sibel Önen Özdemir, Yeliz Şahiner, Selçuk Kayır, Güvenç Doğan, Arzu Akdağlı Ekici, Gökçe Çiçek Dal, Alperen Kısa
